trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料來源控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource> class is a base class that can be used to create any data source control that supports the Entity Framework, LINQ-to-SQL, [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Services, or other data provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource>類別是基底類別，可以用來建立支援 Entity Framework 中的任何資料來源控制項 LINQ-SQL [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Services 或其他資料提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource> class provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property that represents the context type that the data source control works with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource>類別提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>代表資料來源控制項所使用的內容類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the context type for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> class is the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，內容類型為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>類別是<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件名稱，該物件包含要從中擷取資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object that contains the property to retrieve data from.
trans-unit.target: 物件名稱，該物件包含要從中擷取資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源物件中屬性或欄位的名稱，這個物件表示資料集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property or field in the data source object that represents a data collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源物件中屬性或欄位的名稱，這個物件表示資料集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對 Insert、Delete 和 Update 作業建立的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type that is created for Insert, Delete, and Update operations.
trans-unit.target: 針對 Insert、Delete 和 Update 作業建立的型別名稱。
